cache-mem-percent.help: Maximum percentage of available memory allocated to caching (1 - 15).
cache-mem-percent.name: cache-mem-percent

options.help: Expire cache items when the server DB version changes.
options.name: db-ver

cache-prefix-match.help: Enable/disable prefix matching in the cache.
cache-prefix-match.name: cache-prefix-match

close-ports.help: Close ports used for HTTP/HTTPS override authentication and disable user overrides.
close-ports.name: close-ports

embed-image.help: Enable/disable embedding images into replacement messages (default = enable).
embed-image.name: embed-image

ovrd-auth-https.help: Enable/disable use of HTTPS for override authentication.
ovrd-auth-https.name: ovrd-auth-https

ovrd-auth-port-http.help: Port to use for FortiGuard Web Filter HTTP override authentication.
ovrd-auth-port-http.name: ovrd-auth-port-http

ovrd-auth-port-https.help: Port to use for FortiGuard Web Filter HTTPS override authentication in proxy mode.
ovrd-auth-port-https.name: ovrd-auth-port-https

ovrd-auth-port-https-flow.help: Port to use for FortiGuard Web Filter HTTPS override authentication in flow mode.
ovrd-auth-port-https-flow.name: ovrd-auth-port-https-flow

ovrd-auth-port-warning.help: Port to use for FortiGuard Web Filter Warning override authentication.
ovrd-auth-port-warning.name: ovrd-auth-port-warning

request-packet-size-limit.help: Limit size of URL request packets sent to FortiGuard server (0 for default).
request-packet-size-limit.name: request-packet-size-limit

warn-auth-https.help: Enable/disable use of HTTPS for warning and authentication.
warn-auth-https.name: warn-auth-https
